overview:
Olivier is a private equity investor and also has several years experience advising public and private companies on M&A transactions and financings.

As a vice-president of iGan Partners , he participates in the origination, assessment, structuring and execution of new investments.

Prior to joining iGan Partners he was a director in CIBC World Markets’ investment banking group, focusing on the telecom, media and technology sectors. He also worked as a corporate lawyer for Clifford Chance in the United Kingdom and Stikeman Elliott in Montreal. Olivier graduated with a Bachelor of Law Degree from Laval University and holds an MBA from INSEAD
